Package it.polimi.ingsw.Utils.JsonParser

package it.polimi.ingsw.Utils.JsonParser
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    it.polimi.ingsw.Utils
     
    it.polimi.ingsw.Utils.JsonParser.SupportClasses
     
    it.polimi.ingsw.Utils.AssetSerializer
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    CardJsonSerializer
    A utility class for serializing and deserializing Card objects and lists of Cards to and from JSON format using the Gson library.
    Serialization is achieved with one method for all Card classes, de-serialization has to be done using the method for the specific dynamic type.
    CardJsonSerializerDebug
    Class contains static methods to serialize Card->Json and to deserialize Json->Card Objects using the gson library with built-in logic to check for errors in the json.
    SERIALIZATION: It is achieved with standard gson library methods. DESERIALIZATION: By default, the gson parser does not check that the deserialized object matches class specifications because it bypasses the constructors for the class.
    This implementation makes use of support classes to enforce the usage of constructors in the following way:
    Gson is used to parse the input string and is deserialized into an instance of the support class. The support class contains the logic to check that the values read with gson do not break class specifications. If the check is successful, the support class creates and returns the object of the actual class using the appropriate constructors.
    CardJsonSerializerDebugTest
     
    ObjectiveJsonSerializer
    A utility class for serializing and deserializing Objective objects and lists of objectives to and from JSON format.
